name: Banded Side Kicks
description: Targets the gluteus medius to enhance hip stability and lateral strength.

name: Cable Pull Through
description: Engages the glutes and hamstrings while focusing on hip hinge movement.

name: Clamshells
description: Activates the gluteus medius to improve hip strength and stabilization.

name: Dumbbell Frog Pumps
description: Targets the gluteus maximus through fast, repetitive hip thrusts.

name: Fire Hydrants
description: Focuses on the gluteus medius, improving mobility and hip strength.

name: Frog Pumps
description: Isolates the gluteus maximus with rapid pumping hip movements.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Engages the glutes and lower back by lifting hips from the floor.

name: Donkey Kicks
description: Isolates and strengthens the glutes while engaging the lower back for stability.

name: Hip Thrust
description: Targets the gluteus maximus for strength and size through hip extension.

name: Hip Thrust Machine
description: Machine-assisted glute isolation exercise, focusing on hip thrust movement.

name: Lateral Walk With Band
description: Targets the gluteus medius with lateral stepping to improve hip stability.

name: Machine Glute Kickbacks
description: Isolates the glutes through backward kicking movement on a machine.

name: Single Leg Glute Bridge
description: Single-leg version of the glute bridge for improved unilateral strength.

name: Single Leg Hip Thrust
description: Unilateral glute exercise focusing on hip extension and balance.

name: Standing Glute Kickback in Machine
description: Targets the glutes by pushing the leg back against resistance in a machine.

name: Bird Dog
description: Engages glutes and core for stability and coordination through opposite limb extension.

name: Hip Thrust (Barbell)
description: Strengthens glutes with heavy resistance through barbell hip thrusts.

name: Reverse Hyperextension
description: Engages the glutes and lower back through reverse extension of the legs.

name: Single Leg Hip Thrust (Dumbbell)
description: Adds weight to the single-leg hip thrust for greater glute activation.

name: Lateral Band Walks
description: Strengthens the glutes and hips by walking laterally with resistance.

name: Glute Kickback on Floor
description: Bodyweight exercise that isolates the glutes with a backward kicking motion.

name: Glute Kickbacks (Cable)
description: Isolates the glutes using a cable machine for added resistance.

name: Hip Thrust (Dumbbell)
description: Uses a dumbbell for added resistance to strengthen the glutes.

name: Glute Bridge (Dumbbell)
description: Strengthens the glutes with added dumbbell resistance during a hip-lifting movement.
